_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:43:43 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of older people living at home after discharge changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of older people who are still at home 91 days after discharge from hospital into reablement/rehabilitation services has not changed much over time, remaining around 82% since 2009/10.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Adult Social Care - Combined Activity Return (ASC-CAR)
